recommendations.title: Elevate bowl experience – add umami and citrus for depth and freshness
recommendations.description: Poké and wok customers value **flavourful, complex tastes**—and those last finishing touches are what separate a good bowl from a great one. Knorr Professional Intense Flavours Caramelised Umami and Citrus Fresh are liquid seasonings that deliver instant depth, balance, or brightness. A few drops let you level up broths, dressings, or finishing sauces on-demand.

recommendations.title: DIY snacks engage Gen Z – add Summer rolls with Teriyaki dipping sauce
recommendations.description: Summer rolls are an ideal **multi-sensory and interactive snack**, letting your guests engage with their food and create great social media moments. They're perfectly aligned to your health-forward, Asian menu—fresh, colorful, and portable for dine-in or take-out.

recommendations.title: Broth innovation refreshes vegan offering – add Katsu Tofu Broth
recommendations.description: A vegan, katsu-inspired tofu broth taps into both **plant-forward dining and innovative Asian fusion,** giving you a comforting bowl that stands out from the crowd. It solves for diners who want a hot, satisfying meal that's still light, aligning with your healthy, customizable focus.

recommendations.title: Young diners prioritize sustainability
recommendations.description: Younger generations increasingly value transparent sourcing and environmental responsibility in their dining choices.

recommendations.title: 60% prefer elevated comfort food
recommendations.description: Diners seek familiar dishes with premium ingredients and contemporary techniques, creating memorable experiences through refined execution.
